input.sentences: i joined siskoteck a few days ago .
we made the latest in cutting edge tech .
they made the first hdmi converter for tvs .
but it was the new video recorder equipment that caught my eye .
i ended up recording days worth of footage using the camera at our first convention .
output.sentences: We joined siskoteck back in those days.
It was exciting to work with others in this cutting edge tech company.
We worked on development of new TVs with HDMI converters.
I had my eye on a position within the company that focused on development of new video recorders.
To apply for the job, I demonstrated how much my research was worth to the project by sending in a recording of footage I had taken with a recorder I had modified myself.
